Text: Thank you. I wasn't able to watch season 1 and I'm struggling to catch season 2.

Please, please PLEASE upload what's available for season 2...

...help me obi wan kenobi, you're my only hope...
Yes, please seed Season 2. I was in the hospital when these aired and wasn't able to see them all! Thanks so much!

Over 300 people have downloaded this torrent... and as I write this (ONLY 18 HOURS after the original upload) there are only 11 people seeding.   
That means over 90% of downloaders decided not to share back.  It's very doubtful I will waste the bandwidth on season 2.   Maybe I'll have a change of heart and upload it next year.
Check back in October 2013.  Maybe by then the greedy leachers will learn how to share back.
